column6:
A "HOUSE OF M" prelude!,2005,5
Guest-starring DR. STRANGE! Professor Xavier must call in the help of the Sorcerer Supreme to deal with the increasingly dangerous, reality-altering madness of Wanda Maximoff. And perhaps even more dangerous is the grief and desperation of her father, Magneto.
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Transparency Digital | penciller (cover):Aaron Lopresti | letterer:Tom Orzechowski
